bug.text: Enum TypeCodes were not marked as complete, meaning that receiving a struct containing an enum would trigger an assertion failure.

bug.summary: Escaped identifiers in unions cause incorrect errors
bug.text: omniidl would incorrectly report errors for union members clashing with keywords, but escaped with a leading underscore.

bug.summary: localhost server transport rule does not work for IPv4 in IPv6
bug.text: The localhost server transport rule failed to cope with IPv4 addresses encapsulated in IPv6, meaning connections were incorrectly denied.

bug.summary: Connections closed during upcalls could be leaked
bug.text: In thread pool mode, connections closed by a client while the server was in an up-call could be leaked.

bug.summary: Assertion failure in Any marshalling with nil objref

bug.text: omniidl would segfault on exit if given a forward declaration to a previously fully-declared valuetype.

bug.summary: Race condition between Peek and select thread when data in buffer.
bug.text: A race between the select thread and a thread doing peek when there was data already in the connection buffer could lead to a lock-up.
